name: rempl
description: Ð latform for moderated remote access to JavaScript runtime via custom UI
author: Roman Dvornov

scripts.lint: jscs scripts server src && eslint scripts server src
scripts.build: npm run build:rempl && npm run build:server-assets
scripts.build:rempl: browserify -t package-json-versionify --standalone rempl src/index.js | node scripts/process-rempl-bundle.js | uglifyjs --compress keep_fargs=false --mangle --output dist/rempl.js
scripts.build:rempl-dev: browserify -t package-json-versionify --standalone rempl src/index.js | node scripts/process-rempl-bundle.js > dist/rempl.js
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run test
